pr_title: 6579: Input from user can cause SQL exceptions in Personas

timeline.message:
6579: Input from user can cause SQL exceptions in Personas

Modified persona classes to run SQL as prepared statements.

timeline.bodyText: @raman-bt and @gdicristofaro, I think we can hadnle closing of the ResultSet more cleanly using another try with resources.
timeline.author: rcordovano

timeline.bodyText: @raman-bt and @gdicristofaro, this method is documented as executing an UPDATE/INSERT/DELETE statement. We need to acquire the exclusive (write) lock, not the shared (read) lock.
timeline.author: rcordovano

timeline.bodyText:
Perhaps we want to call the new methods:
executeCommand
executeQuery
?
timeline.author: rcordovano
